docs.text:
Roaming Gamer Docs




Still assembling this site. Bear with me if you are visting before it is completed.


~ 
The Roaming Gamer
 01 DEC 2016




Product Types






















Almost all my products require SSK2. 
Get It Now!






AskEd


My answers to your questions in the 
Corona Forums
.






Free Stuff


As of last count, hundreds of projects, containing 624 Lua files and over 66,368 lines of code.






Kernels


Focused examinations of game and app mechanics.






Plugins


Feature specific libraries/modules distributed through the Corona plugin system.






Templates


Complete games and applications, ready to modify and/or reskin.






Tools


Complete solutions to common Corona SDK game and app design problems.








Requesting Something


Do you have a cool idea?  Am I missing a product that is critical to your game or app?


Whatever the case, you can ask me to make it 
HERE
.  Just make a post with these details:




Title
 - Roaming Gamer: Can You Make XYZ?


Body
 - Describe the thing you want me to make.  Try to be as clear as possible.




I will respond as soon as I see the post and we will proceed from there.  


Thank You!




  Copyright

Templates


Templates
 are "complete games and applications," designed for you to learn from and to create with these primary goals:




Provide a starting point for you to make your own games and apps by reskinning.

Keep game and app development simple and fun.
